name: WASTELAND!
description:
Prelude: "At the end of the decade, the world was in a state of constant war.. No one knows who unleashed the "Mutents" - genetically modified insects with enhanced size, speed and intelligence.

The Mutents multiplied until they became unstoppable.. We fought back, laying waste to the planet... 20 years have passed, most of humanity is gone."

WASTELAND is a first person shooter designed to be played in portrait mode.
This game offers hours of gameplay, 6 awesome weapons, a giant map, dozens of enemies to destroy and perfectly designed controllers.
